review: Easy to use and works great
author: Ted A. Jimenez "Fisherman"

review: l enjoy using the Chromecast. It was simple to set up, is very portable (I trade between living room set and one in bedroom) and is a must for those who want to "cut the cord" of cable companies.
author: Tayja

review: Too complicated getting to correct website to download app.  Should be easier way to complete streaming process.
author: Hilda Simmons
